about_the_game:
Rampage Agents is a VR game that includes hero shooting battle royale and multiplayer cooperative adventure gameplay. Players will take control of increasingly diverse and powerful superhuman agents, form tactical squads with friends, and fight together!

🎮 Battle Royale Mode:


Create your tactic squad and utilize your hero skill, weapon and items to ensure your survival. Become the last one standing in the massive map.

- KEY FEATURES:

  • 🔥Diverse Tactical Skills. Not just for expert shooters!


  • 🔥Over 100 different items and various weapons. Each weapon has its own unique ability.

🎮 Adventure Mode:(Over 12 hours of content, multiplayer mode requires the purchase of the Multiplayer Adventure Expansion Pack)


Fused with Roguelite elements and dynamic tactical options, you can play as different agents with different skill sets in procedurally-generated stages with random loots. Find the right weapon & chip combo and level up the skills to create a unique build among tens of thousands of possible combinations.

- KEY FEATURES:

  • 🔥FPS+Roguelite+RPG combined gameplay, construct diverse Build through death cycle for different experience


  • 🔥Many heroes and multiple game plus with different game mechanisms


  • 🔥Dozens of personalized dyes available to customize your skin

name: Rampage Agents

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Valve Index, Oculus Rift, Quest 2, Pico neo3, Pico4, Quest Pro, Quest3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Valve Index, Oculus Rift, Quest 2, Pico neo3, Pico4, Quest Pro, Quest3

short_description: Rampage Agents is a VR game that fuses battle royale with multi-player action adventure games. Obtain powerful agents with unique powers and team up with your friends now!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support
